aboutSection.heading: About Me
aboutSection.description1: Hi! I'm Carlos Keglevich, a Backend-oriented Full-Stack Developer based in Germany, focused on building secure and scalable enterprise applications.
aboutSection.description2: I specialize in Java Spring Boot and React/TypeScript, developing robust REST APIs with strong architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and end-to-end testing.
aboutSection.description3: Outside of coding, I enjoy long walks in nature, playing chess, staying active, and reading about technology and innovation.

experience1.title: Backend-oriented Full-Stack Developer | Personal Project
experience1.summary: Built an enterprise inventory and supplier management system using Java Spring Boot, React, and automated CI/CD.

experience2.title: Duagon GmbH, Electronics Factory | Machine Operator & Software Analyst
experience2.summary: Operated production machinery and analyzed software for PCB soldering processes to ensure quality and optimize processes.

experience3.title: K&K Brands, Atlanta (USA/Brazil) | Buyer & Data Analyst
experience3.summary: Analyzed pricing trends and developed data-driven purchasing strategies to improve efficiency and profitability.

experience4.title: Alcon-Novartis, Atlanta USA | Production Worker
experience4.summary: Monitored production quality and implemented process improvements — increased efficiency by 45%.

experience5.title: Thriftshopper Stores & Warehouse | Logistics Associate
experience5.summary: Optimized warehouse organization and pricing workflows to increase efficiency and product availability.

experience6.title: Polícia Civil – Goiânia, Brazil | Investigator
experience6.summary: Led investigations and conflict resolutions in complex cases — focused on analysis, communication, and accountability.

Liability for content

The contents of this website were created with the greatest care. However, no guarantee can be given for the accuracy, completeness and topicality of the contents.

Liability for links

This website contains links to external third-party websites, over which I have no influence. Therefore, I cannot accept any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.

Copyright

The content and works created by the site operator on these pages are subject to German copyright law.

Privacy Policy

This website respects your privacy. No personal data is actively collected, stored, or shared without your consent.

The website does not use cookies, analytics, or tracking services. Server logs may be collected by the hosting provider for security and performance and are deleted automatically within a reasonable period.

If you contact me by e-mail, the information you provide (such as your name, email address, and message) will be processed solely to respond to your inquiry.
